t: Patience is necessary, and one cannot reap immediately where one has sown.
He that can have patience can have what he will.
I have just three things to teach: simplicity, patience, compassion. These three are your greatest treasures.
I think there's not much patience for organized labour, period, public or private sector.
Sad Patience, too near neighbour to despair.
Meekness: Uncommon patience in planning a revenge that is worth while.

I believe there's too little patience and context to many of the investigations I read or see on television.
Patience and time do more than strength or passion.
This is the story of what a Woman's patience can endure, and what a Man's resolution can achieve.
A healthy male adult bore consumes each year one and a half times his own weight in other people's patience.

As for goals, I don't set myself those anymore. I'm not one of these 'I must have achieved this and that by next year' kind of writers. I take things as they come and find that patience and persistence tend to win out in the end.
Never a tear bedims the eye that time and patience will not dry.
The two most powerful warriors are patience and time.

The days of our lives, for all of us, are numbered. We know that. And yes, there are certainly times when we aren't able to muster as much strength and patience as we would like. It's called being human.
Patience has its limits, take it too far and it's cowardice.

My wife is the most awesome person in the universe. She's made this experience much less miserable for me, with her compassion, patience and understanding.

I will exercise patience and will provide all facts to the general public.
Fortune knocks but once, but misfortune has much more patience.

Patience is the companion of wisdom.
Patience is the best medicine.

The very important thing you should have is patience.

Humility is attentive patience.
Hopelessness has surprised me with patience.
